fields.headline: Genius crossword No 182
fields.bodyText: Click here to access the print version Six across and six down solutions could be 22 (which is unclued) and are not further defined. All the clues to the other solutions have an unwanted 22, either in their wordplay or definition. Deadline for entries is 23:59 BST on Saturday 1 September. You need to register once and then sign in to theguardian.com to enter our online competition for a £100 monthly prize. Click here to register
